citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00pm on 20-Sep-
21.
Contacted licensee by phone and licensee was in town with no other responsible adult home available for inspection.
End Section
